name: Immortal Cyber Style
text:
You can only use this Skill's second and third effects once per turn.
1: You cannot Normal or Special Summon any monsters except for Machine and Dragon "Cyber" monsters and Level 5 or higher LIGHT Machine monsters (excluding Special Summons from the Extra Deck).
2: During your Main Phase, send 1 "Cyber Dragon" from your Deck to the Graveyard.
3: During your Main Phase, you can make all monsters you currently control Level 5 until the end of the turn.
